text: Sheldon Springs is an unincorporated community village in the town of Sheldon in Franklin County, Vermont, United States. It lies at an altitude of . A post office was established in 1871. At one time it was known as Olmstead Falls. It is the location of Maple Glen Nudist Camp.Maple Glen, Vermont's Best Kept Secret ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Vermont Category:Unincorporated communities in Franklin County, Vermont Category:Sheldon, Vermont
title: Sheldon Springs, Vermont
